segments.text: In this drawn kitchen, everything seems ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the counter, attentively wiping a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so concentrated, blocking out the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the faucet runs unchecked, causing the basin to overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, ruining the wood below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A slippery puddle spreads, and her shoe is already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, body elongated toward the shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look safe; it's tilting back alarmingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar, eyes probably sparkling with mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates, standing close with her arm raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression shows pure anticipation for that cookie reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a calm yard with plants and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks perfect, but inside hazards lurk unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking thinking about the potential fall or slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
